<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">  MLC.dysymtab&#95;command&#95;data.iextdefsym = NumLocalSymbols;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">  MLC.dysymtab&#95;command&#95;data.nextdefsym = NumExtDefSymbols;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">  MLC.dysymtab&#95;command&#95;data.iundefsym = NumLocalSymbols + NumExtDefSymbols;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">  MLC.dysymtab&#95;command&#95;data.nundefsym =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">      O.SymTable.Symbols.size() - (NumLocalSymbols + NumExtDefSymbols);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Recomputes and updates offset and size fields in load commands and sections</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// since they could be modified.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">uint64&#95;t MachOLayoutBuilder::layoutSegments() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/btf/#ac469d636ea54a1eb9da4c1f633a4496ca4af5f992bdc47a779c499ffc6fdcaf43">HeaderSize</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">      Is64Bit ? </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(MachO::mach&#95;header&#95;64) : sizeof(MachO::mach&#95;header);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsObjectFile =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">      O.Header.FileType == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/macho/#a4099e754341e36bdbc04624fa2f1e19aa0720b97729bd97889599a4dc76faf0dc">MachO::HeaderFileType::MH&#95;OBJECT</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = IsObjectFile ? (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/btf/#ac469d636ea54a1eb9da4c1f633a4496ca4af5f992bdc47a779c499ffc6fdcaf43">HeaderSize</a> + O.Header.SizeOfCmds) : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we are emitting an encryptable binary, our load commands must have a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// separate (non-encrypted) page to themselves.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RequiresFirstSectionOutsideFirstPage =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">      O.EncryptionInfoCommandIndex.has&#95;value();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LoadCommand &amp;LC : O.LoadCommands) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">    auto &amp;MLC = LC.MachOLoadCommand;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    StringRef Segname;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t SegmentVmAddr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t SegmentVmSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">    switch (MLC.load&#95;command&#95;data.cmd) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">    case MachO::LC&#95;SEGMENT:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">      SegmentVmAddr = MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.vmaddr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">      SegmentVmSize = MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.vmsize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">      Segname = StringRef(MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.segname,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">                          strnlen(MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.segname,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  sizeof(MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.segname)));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">      break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">    case MachO::LC&#95;SEGMENT&#95;64:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">      SegmentVmAddr = MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.vmaddr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">      SegmentVmSize = MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.vmsize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">      Segname = StringRef(MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.segname,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">                          strnlen(MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.segname,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  sizeof(MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.segname)));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">      break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">    default:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">      continue;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#acdfbcf188e2d4a80837e89de2ccdffab">if</a> (Segname == </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#95;&#95;LINKEDIT&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We update the &#95;&#95;LINKEDIT segment later (in layoutTail).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#aa9d03f7cb5acb5efb6c8aaa9fa5df989">Sections</a>.empty() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#95;&#95;LINKEDIT segment has sections&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">      LinkEditLoadCommand = &amp;MLC;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update file offsets and sizes of sections.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t SegOffset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t SegFileSize = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t VMSize = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Section&gt; &amp;Sec : LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#aa9d03f7cb5acb5efb6c8aaa9fa5df989">Sections</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">      assert(SegmentVmAddr &lt;= Sec-&gt;Addr &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Section&#39;s address cannot be smaller than Segment&#39;s one&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint32&#95;t SectOffset = Sec-&gt;Addr - SegmentVmAddr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">      if (IsObjectFile) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">        if (!Sec-&gt;hasValidOffset()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">          Sec-&gt;Offset = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125; else &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">          uint64&#95;t PaddingSize =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">              offsetToAlignment(SegFileSize, Align(1ull &lt;&lt; Sec-&gt;Align));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">          Sec-&gt;Offset = SegOffset + SegFileSize + PaddingSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">          Sec-&gt;Size = Sec-&gt;Content.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">          SegFileSize += PaddingSize + Sec-&gt;Size;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">        if (!Sec-&gt;hasValidOffset()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">          Sec-&gt;Offset = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">          if (RequiresFirstSectionOutsideFirstPage) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">            SectOffset = alignToPowerOf2(SectOffset, PageSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">            RequiresFirstSectionOutsideFirstPage = false;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">          Sec-&gt;Offset = SegOffset + SectOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">          Sec-&gt;Size = Sec-&gt;Content.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">          SegFileSize = std::max(SegFileSize, SectOffset + Sec-&gt;Size);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">      VMSize = std::max(VMSize, SectOffset + Sec-&gt;Size);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsObjectFile) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> += SegFileSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + SegFileSize, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#a90146d35673da9e3e4a7f41f3b8c9b7e">PageSize</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">      SegFileSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(SegFileSize, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#a90146d35673da9e3e4a7f41f3b8c9b7e">PageSize</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use the original vmsize if the segment is &#95;&#95;PAGEZERO.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">      VMSize =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">          Segname == </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#95;&#95;PAGEZERO&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ? SegmentVmSize : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(VMSize, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#a90146d35673da9e3e4a7f41f3b8c9b7e">PageSize</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MLC.load&#95;command&#95;data.cmd) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MachO::LC&#95;SEGMENT:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.cmdsize =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(MachO::segment&#95;command) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(MachO::section) &#42; LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#aa9d03f7cb5acb5efb6c8aaa9fa5df989">Sections</a>.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.nsects = LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#aa9d03f7cb5acb5efb6c8aaa9fa5df989">Sections</a>.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.fileoff = SegOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.vmsize = VMSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.filesize = SegFileSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MachO::LC&#95;SEGMENT&#95;64:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.cmdsize =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(MachO::segment&#95;command&#95;64) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(MachO::section&#95;64) &#42; LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#aa9d03f7cb5acb5efb6c8aaa9fa5df989">Sections</a>.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.nsects = LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#aa9d03f7cb5acb5efb6c8aaa9fa5df989">Sections</a>.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.fileoff = SegOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.vmsize = VMSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.filesize = SegFileSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">uint64&#95;t MachOLayoutBuilder::layoutRelocations(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LoadCommand &amp;LC : O.LoadCommands)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Section&gt; &amp;Sec : LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#aa9d03f7cb5acb5efb6c8aaa9fa5df989">Sections</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">      Sec-&gt;RelOff = Sec-&gt;Relocations.empty() ? 0 : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">      Sec-&gt;NReloc = Sec-&gt;Relocations.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> += </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(MachO::any&#95;relocation&#95;info) &#42; Sec-&gt;NReloc;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a902b0d55fddef6f8d651fe1035b7d4bd">Error</a> MachOLayoutBuilder::layoutTail(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we are building the layout of an executable or dynamic library</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which does not have any segments other than &#95;&#95;LINKEDIT,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the Offset can be equal to zero by this time. It happens because of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// convention that in such cases the file offsets specified by LC&#95;SEGMENT</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// start with zero (unlike the case of a relocatable object file).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/btf/#ac469d636ea54a1eb9da4c1f633a4496ca4af5f992bdc47a779c499ffc6fdcaf43">HeaderSize</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">      Is64Bit ? </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(MachO::mach&#95;header&#95;64) : sizeof(MachO::mach&#95;header);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!(O.Header.FileType == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/macho/#a4099e754341e36bdbc04624fa2f1e19aa0720b97729bd97889599a4dc76faf0dc">MachO::HeaderFileType::MH&#95;OBJECT</a>) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &gt;= HeaderSize + O.Header.SizeOfCmds) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Incorrect tail offset&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, HeaderSize + O.Header.SizeOfCmds);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The exports trie can be in either LC&#95;DYLD&#95;INFO or in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
